issues.message: Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'current_if'.
Remove this assignment to local variable 'out'; the value is never used.
Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'namespace'.
Remove this assignment to local variable '_rc'; the value is never used.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "<".
Replace this generic exception class with a more specific one.
Delete this unreachable code or refactor the code to make it reachable.
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
